name: Chinesimple Classifiers
description: The new Chinese HSK Classifiers application will help you to easily and interactively dominate the Chinese Classifiers.  In this application you will find comprehensive examples of use of the Chinese Classifiers, along 9 very common thematic: quantities, distances, hours, currency, time and other units.  But there are more: 6 different games, +500 challenges and 24 achievements are waiting for you. With Chinese HSK Classifiers you will listen, speak, write and play while you are checking your progress. Full stats will show your learning progress and mistakes.   Dominate this Chinese level easily!  (text to speech Powered by iSpeech)  CONTENT  Dictionary with the 118 classifiers words  Simplified and Traditional hanzi characters  Save your words in your starred list  Search words by meaning, hanzi or pinyin  Voice search (Chinese and English, requires internet connection)  69 sentences and expressions spread over 9 everyday topics  Chinese lessons (only in English, requires internet connection)  6 different games  24 achievements  +500 challenges  Chinese stroke order  Hanzi color tones  All audio content is recorded by a Chinese native  Possibility to record your own audio pronunciation  Voice Recognition (requires internet connection)  Real-time learning stats  Check your mistakes  Adapted for smartphone and tablet  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish  This lite version has reduced content
